thought: Above
Sex is not what we are made for but it is extremely important and does not have to be at all how we or I perceive it.

I think I want a girl that is tame and cute and wants romantic sex. She is bubbly and adorable but genuine and not annoying. These are feelings I have but I have no face to that. (this has changed by end of trip)
I could write endlessly, it won't quite cut having the best idea.
There is so much more we don't know.
You have no mental model, then it gets built and its hard to unlearn.
The kid wonders and learns and touches and then then he is sedated and is picked up and told to sit.
Knowledge is endless. Beliefs as well. Its good to learn but it does not progress us forward without action.
What is the importance and the action that can be taken from each realization.
Does the thing you see or discover bring fear or love or confusion and a mix?
Convergence of odds and numbers.

Why does dtouching something feel nice? Associations? Not just associations. At birth, blanked feels nice and spikes or rough paper do not. This is because this causes pain. (Something i'm still unclear about). But what does something nice cause? Is it just associations that made you perceive feeling a certain feeling? Texture and feeling. Where do the two overlap and how mood is perceived like a color might be.

Lose some of my fear. My fear to accomplish what i know i can. Perhaps to be myself. I am not boring but I am not the energetic goofy kid I was. I think that kid was annoying and I couldn't be him with everyone. There are plenty of people that have never seen that side of me.
I cannot write this for others. Otherise i will be contrived in my thoughts and deliberations.

I have to be ruthless. Able to get to my core. There are realizations that I have felt tinkering on the edge of my brain that I have been afraid to embrace. I know for some though, there is no turning back once they are realized. WHile they may be logically sound thoughts and inspiring they change the way I Perceive the world. if I pursue them, then the way I interact with people, how I perceive people's actions, what I think is right and how I think other will respond all becomes up for question. it is very easy to become lost. I think many crazies were are too many realizations over the threshold of what we can juggle. it becomes difficult to interact in a society where you no longer have a working mental model of how it operates. Society rejects you because you seem odd and think differently. You reject society not as a superfluous gesture of pride or individualism, but because the way it operates is unclear to you and seems backwards at times.

Even if you hold on to your understanding of how one makes jokes and what wording in a text message yields the best response, when your mind warps and maneuvers so that you are in such a different frame of mind you realize that you have no idea what people are thinking and you have an appreciation and understanding for the propensity at which people can think differently. One can float around within a frame of mind, and one can leave it. Our ability to communicate effectively and anticipate responses to our words and situations that arise around us is largely based on that the mental of model of your peers have been shaped by the same gross factors that have shaped you.
Cloud How you define love? A deep level of respect? Men
Islam men driving slow in a fancy car so as not to make a poor man think about his slow life.
You really have to surround yourself by the type of people you want  to become.
Practicing not acting on "a" or "b", but changing the odds and making my path Â© work.

Practicing not thinking as if it is for someone else. Practicing meditating, but I am restless. Practicing not thinking shallowly. Wondering if the look on someone face gives insight into who they are. Practicing being who I want to be.
Purpose, Love - why? When you lose your lust and that falling out happens, they have to your best friend (without looks or lust).
People dedicate lives to figuring certain things out. We don't have time to figure all out.

Morning: Say who I want to be. Get in confident state. Start metabolism. Say purpose in life and that any action that day will help me get there. Say what my life is going to look like in a year or two. Say the things I have a burning desire for and feel it.
Read things on the way hime that motivate. Remind me that I am capable of making something great.
Not for fame, rather because I can. Not deep, somewhat oblivious, but happy and successful (Larry Balaban vs. Peter Stein).
I can be whoever I want. I imagine me being that person with the person I'm talking to and I think about the characteristics of that person. I pretend I am that person and I am.
Execution is all. Many claim to think an invent, but few execute and follow through. The one who gets to the top is often the one with the balls to take action at each step and to not stop.
Inaction is probably a huge reason for lack of innovation and happiness.
There is no inherent meaning. Only perceived meaning.

Texture, paintings are on a spectrum, much like drums to violin to singing. Vowels to singing words. There is a threshold where it has "meaning" but every sound you hear reminds you of something or strikes a certain emotion.
There may be things that are inherent or mathematical, but much is determined by what you've seen and how you developed your mental model for how the world looks and works.
Acting a certain way or being in a mode that is justified by how I think I must be to survive puts me in that mode.
WHy should a face be attractive?Only a look on a face should be.
People bring misery and complete happiness. Happy with certain friends but not complete fullness. I worry with most about something but not all. Not a girlfriend of a long time either.
In some ways people are like television. A way to shut off, they also provide surprise, comfort and new information that is generation for nothing. This helps relieve boredom. Perhaps.
Trust. Part of being your unreserved self. No trust with corruption. No rising of the lower class. Little progress.
Small details distract from that of importance.

Perfect society, few would think it all the way through. Few would write it down. Few would sketch. Few would CAD. Few would sculpt. Few would live. Few would seek criticism. Few would start over. Few would do research. Few would plan. Few would find site. Few would seek others doing it. Few would recruit the best. Few would convince them. Few would try to succeed. Few would sacrifice. Few would convince others to sacrifice. Few would sustain. Few would convince customers. Few would not anger employees. Few would capture press. Few would get first client. Few would do well. Few would get contractors for right price. Few would get contractors to succeed. Few would not break down. Few would not say "we picked something too hard." Few would keep passion. Few would not second and third and fourth guess if anyone wanted this. Few would be sure it was even the best. Few would ship with confidence. Few of these cannot be overcome, yet few people will try. Few people will think it through because they will get tired and distracted. And because few people care enough. There is a road ahead of them, perhaps not the one they dreamed of, but one that will do just fine.
Sometimes people don't know what they want, or do not have strong convictions and so they let themselves go along this other path.

You close your eyes for just a second and a fog rolls in. You can feel a realization then it fades and you are unsure if it was profound. You feel as though it was but you cannot wrap your head around the thought's importance. You can feel that you're close to cracking something and if you don't get it in that moment it will be gone. And you struggle for a bit but part of your mind shifts just a bit to a  thought provoked by the fact that you had this realization and gradually you move away and forget you even had the moment of realization, never mind that you could not figure it out.

Who am i? I'm different in different states of mind. Neither is correct, some are better or worse for achieving certain things. What do I want to achieve in life? Makes you ask what the purpose of life is. If you ask, what is the goal, you could say there is none or make one up from yourself or religion. If ants don't have goals or purpose, than why would I? If I remove the word "life" so it is just what its he purpose of a leaf, or the purpose of a leaf's life, you look at it differently. And a rock, its purpose? Does the leaf try to define our purpose? If not, why are we correct in the purpose of the leaf? We've come to conclusions that are just as ridiculous as th leaf' lack of conclusion. Unless we choose to believe someone told us, who we believed, there is no way of knowing because it usb ased on logic that is constructed by a balance of chemicals in our head that is good for us surviving but is otherwise as arbitrary as the balance of chemicals in any other animal's head. Perhaps this does not discount deductive reasoning and math as we understand it is very real. Even so, without knowing why we are here, how can we know what the point of life is and why we should aim to fulfill a purpose. The way you phrasee it seems crucial as well.
I become restless and anxious at this point in thought. I want to move but then I will not return in thought.

I've never really wanted something that badly to fight with a ll I've got. Most things I would be okay if they did not happen my way or as I thought may be best. I am never that sure that I need it. Without purpose how can you be so sure that anything is what you need. Even with purpose, how?

You would have no either really really want and need something, or an alternative or not having it be made would suffice. That is why when you have no back up plan and the back up plan means death or something terrible, you may be more likely to succeed because you must move forward with conviction. You must give it your very all because there is no other plan that could work out.

If I must become something, I can figure out steps to doing it. But when MUST I have one thing? To feel that sure you must be desperate and in survival mode or you must be driven by overwhelming emotion. Logic or feeling.

For overwhelming emotion you can be driven seemingly blindly. You will do things you would not normally. You justify reason based on emotion. You could convince yourself a decision was correct either way if you emotions tell you it was right. You simply weigh logical standpoints with heavier magnitudes.

Something tragic or inspiring can motivate for a time, or a burning desire to become something. But for what reason? To prove to someone else or to yourself? To look better and feel stronger to meet a better companion or make more money? To what avail? To live a life that was happy. That perhaps there are many formulas to happiness that differ based on your perception to happiness. That for some of these equations richness and power is a factor. Or that the ability to make change and feel substantial is af actor. To feel your story was epic and romance was movie like. Are these formulas, or rather, perceptions, are? Or are they borrowed from movies and parents and friends? Is any perception not borrowed? No. No perception is pure just as the leaf's thoughts are the same as ours. But some perceptions are better for living within the environment you choose and the thoughts and mental model that are engrained deep inside of you. Some are healthier and bring more years of children who can better cope and this seems absolute. But there are so many factors and variations of any style of thinking or way to achieve an unclear perceived happiness that we cannot calculate or predict the very best way to live. To work only at that could yield enlightenment or it could yield regression, circular thought and insanity. WE do not take this risk as an enlightenment is an idea of happiness that is absolute but may just be a really good "relative." We prefer to trod making occasional stabs at happiness. Thinking about it lightly our whole life but never dedicating ourselves to finding it. Why should we? Happiness is after all, an option for a goal of life and how can you define happiness is, again, an opinion.

Perhaps happiness is not the goal at all but that making others lives better, or that experiencing every emotion or that dying are all arbitrary fine ways to live ones life but seemingly more difficult considering how we experience motions. A rock could be sitting or could be continually thrown to the ground and cracked and grinder and we would not think its life is worse, but because our brain perceives these things as pain, when we are tried and tested ist is not the same, it is pain. And with low and pain comes the beauty of happiness which is far more enjoyable to experience and so it seems there is a better and worse way to live because there is a maximization and minimization of pleasure and pain, making occurrences that are arbitrary seem better or worse for our life with the ultimate goal of perhaps experiencing ultimate pleasure without pain.

I just saw a person dead in the street and no one did anything. All of the sirens and faces suddenly seemed like a war torn country and the sky seemed more gray. Yet at the taj mahal things were still, blue, silent with drums and chimes of construction and birds painting strokes around a shy structure. Your stimuli frames your mind and your mind morphs its environment.

Your life is essentially a story. Like a movie it can be a style that you enjoy or one you don't depending on your thoughts and how you look at the world. It is possible that people can paint a better world for others through music, tools, new ways of thinking, better architecture, etcâ¦

That is essentially what an acid trip is, its a beautiful version of how you could look at the world. But its like doing it on steroids. You can still hit really well without steroids and tools and difference stances can make you hit better. Also, the fact that happiness is not just scalar in the sense of unhappy or happy but that happiness is a categorization in itself and all of the different components that form happiness almost make a circle and by adding all of the different elements they rise into a cone. Molly may seem like it should give you that element of happiness but because of the way we think and what we deem as beautiful, you need something that can hit those many different feelings you have and wants you have to create this truly beautiful scene that can bring true happiness. If you want to be in the best environment possible, walking on clouds may not be enough because there are other feelings that you want. Feeling finished, feeling sure, feeling unstoppable, feeling intrigued by everything. There is a gambit of emotion that matters to us, and that is why designing something so well is so difficult. Functional does not just mean it does a function. Part of its function is making it so you enjoy it, and enjoy your experience and your time while using it. To achieve this, it must make you feel many of these emotions that you want to feel. A desk chair should make you feel unstoppable, brilliant, creative, confident to pick up a phone. These are the things I want in my desk chair just as much or more as it can raise and lower me. This is why purchasing luxuries is not so bad (necessarily). It becomes religion. It creates an environment and a mindset of how you should feel and think, which creates what you believe. My interior design forms the way I see the world more than a prayer book might.

Seems like each great experience is a waste if I don't remember and internalize it. Perhaps I felt good in that moment but you can't always feel god or rather do things to feel good. Can you? Your world would end and you would be happy at every moment. But there are times when you are not happy, have nothing to do, or with you could do something better. In these moments, improvement, beforehand can make you more able, more likely to feel satisfyied perhaps with the good moments you've had.

I think if you practice remembering parts of your day, perhaps only the good, or perhaps remember them in a pleasant light, than you will remember that later on and perhaps with fondness. When a view is worth saving, take a bunch of snapshots with your eyes by blinking a few times. I have not tried remembering smells and sounds, only sights but I imagine it to be the same.
You may create false memories of the incidence. WHo knows.
There is something about prayer and ritual that is very nice. I think making something where each person can customize their ritual would be splendid. Modules that they could add. SECT. Religee.

xecution is EVERYTHING. Styles can be more or less relevant and potential functionality can be great, but unless it is done above a certain threshold, it is crap. Build something really simple that works well, or really complicated that works well, but it must feel right. Apple products feel right. Nothing forced. There is not only one solution to a problem but there are ones that feel complete and proper and ones that are lacking some quality.

Big scale you have things that are more likely to be good or bad. The general plot of a story matters. There is a reason some stories are better than others. But then with the same story, a book, a movie, and its remake are all so different, some better than the others. Where it really comes through though is small details. Every little design choice, writing and producing choice, speaking, wearing, walking, moving choice makes a difference in how people perceive and judge something. All commercials show a product on a white background, yet, in all honesty, Apple appeals the most. The product turns at the right speed or shows a person smiling that seems most genuine. And that person's movements, twitches and blinks remind you of positive similar suppressions you've seen in life and media in the past.

Sweating can feel spiritual. Right now I feel nothing. I am less stressed than usual (than i would have been 3 weeks ago here). Does the lack of fear translate to all things? I think not. I have to conquer each version of the fear or thing holding me back. Just because we classify all fears of talking to people into one category does not make them the same. i can do fine with strangers now perhaps, but no better with girls on investors necessarily. Although probably somewhat.

Creating something new is so difficult and takes so much time that no wonder people follow religion. For one person to dedicate their life to it, its difficult to come up with answers. People have come up with decent answers for you over thousands of years.
I love my parents. And the potential of our relationship. I would want no more sarcasm. Everyone to just chill.
I think I've come to realize how important people are and that you become like them, even if not on purpose.
Things made of blocks, events. Only certain blocks work, but there are so many. The combination of them can be fresh and proper, new and beautiful, but surprising.
Create low friction environments for the way you want to live. Makeit easy to say no and yes when you want.

Thinking about the law of numbers and how easy it is for something not to get done, everything you surround yourself should be enabling you to think and act and do and learn in the way you want to. They should make it seamless and frictionless.
Middletism - not the divine acid trip of jobs or the quirkily of all else. Just human?
There are so many buildings and cities that its amazing there are people to fill them. Of course they are not all filled at the same time.

Anime is a distinct style. Like a walk, it has a certain character. Combining cultures artwork can butcher or it can create a style that is perhaps more pure or proper - more "right" opinion less but beautiful, absent of associations attached to it. I think this sit he ultimate design. you think of its beauty and purity rather then the context from which it came. It requires flawless execution.

Video games are worth it in that stories are novels are. Not just blind fun, but beauty, cinema, characters, choices, heroism, deep ideas about the parts of life that still are magic or not understood. They can play upon this part of life.
You can create a structure that tells a divine story that only the creator can understand. Or you can create a universal one, or allow each person to create their own story.
Seems like 24 hour rule for song might be good for many things. Music, art, people, places, activities.
Perhaps it si because we like new information. Certain things start to become revolting when focusing on just that. Yet sharing makings it difficult to get any one thing done.
Getting a great deal done is what we want to do, not what we were meant to do.
Spirituality bores me now, sickens me, but idol gossip is also terrible.
I think its the middle path. Not extremes. A balanced day. Schedule it otherwise you will fall out of balance. What are the things you are missing.
A few diff reading stimuli, 1 good meal, some comedy, some giving thanks, some hard work towards something you love.

The other part is to remember. make an actual attempt to remember the things you see, because it is like learning names or hearing numbers, you forget immediately. But your remember better second or third time. It becomes part of your thoughts and vocabulary.

Originality also can combine and improve on elements of the past which are all missing something or are caught up in their own thoughts or ways. It creates the lack of harsh thoughts through "unadulterated" style.
If you receive great praise you still feel empty unless you believe it. Believe you have ascended the planes of what is possible. Create! Improve! Push! Think!

The shape of my brain feels different upon certain thoughts. Just create and do not search for approval. Search for what is divine and reject approval, except self-apparent. But have it be functional. Do not need or take praise. It hurts. Enjoy the journey. Enjoy making. See beauty in making. The result is only approval that won't satisfy. Life is all journey, even at local endpoints. Give yourself up for what youc an create and be okay with it because you enjoy creating more than using. And that is true. Get better at making it as you think and it should be.

The thing I intended to create is the pure thing. Even if the other thing is great, it seems wrong to me. Impure,. What a waste. Its lacking. Its not perfect. Improper connotations. Just does. You knew its true.
All being fundamentally = does not mean one must grant each with the same level of love.
Seeking God and finding oneself.
Many believe they know what can save society but all are forgetting some consequence, not calculating some factor.
Maybe not reaching potential is for the best for life to continue effortlessly. Hope not.
doing all to create what is believe to be best will make oneself an enemy as explained. Others have a soul.
Music is sound composed beautifully. Imagine video composed beautiful as well. Clips of sight arranged into beauty.
The things I want to remember I must synthesize and arrange in a new way, or trace, etcâ¦ Then try to remember again later.
Need to create collection and reference. Always improvements I don't think of.
Use a scene that reminds me of who I am, makes me better and puts me at peace. Use a scene depending on my mood. Music listening to, read emails and messages for anger.
How would hearing all your neighbors said, change your culture.

A story must surprise you or remind you. Perhaps small things can be understood. Why not integrate this into your religion and your operating system. create this masterful story to begin and end your day and work day.
Why do I want to create things. Reasons come to mind but I can feel they are wrong.

Small accomplishments make you feel like the man. Ex that. Small happening make you think you are the man and they give you a false and shallow sense that you are great. That just as it was built on others opinions and attention and not our own believe our self worth, it can be taken down by those same opinions.
You cannot kill a man's self resepect. You can only kill his pretense at it. Unless you bring him to believe he is not what he thought he was.
It assumes that we know what is right. And that we are acting as we think is right. And living up to the potential we believe we have.

Not living up to my potential often does not better me. I can think about a normal life. I have no been fully convinced I need to do great things instead of living normally. Working hard and the possibility of being wrong is real. Failing does not worry as much as being wrong. If I am wrong then the things I believe about myself being better or great are false and I feel I have been rocked, perhaps I am normal, not messiah or martyr worthy. Living up to my potential scares me. It means I have to have performed. I am not sure enough about myself. I hold other men above me and so I cannot perform on their level because I believe I cannot and that I have no golden answer yet, so I should not. Or that I am making something for the hell of it, but it is ephemeral.

How do you say you are the best if you have nothing that makes you better. You don't need to be better, only the same in a new way (which is better), but if I don't believe it then I can only be better at operations, which interest me, but its a means to an end.
Could you make a whole company as a means to an end? Really as a way to make a living for people. Is that wrong? If it is an indifferent company. Creates no good and no harm but it employs people?

My goal is not to sell coffee. My goal is to provide people with a great place to work by filling a need for others. Then it does not matter what you are working on too much. Of course you can fill a great need vs. a want. Coffee vs. Lifestraws.
Nowâ¦why do I want to create. if no one ever knew I created, would I still do it?
So create the tools and create the best version of their use, assuming you can, and you know best. Then you are pushing forward rather than merely suggesting a thought that takes the world no where.
Its not enough to invent. You must take it to its best form and make it spread, if you believe it is the best option. This means different things at different stages.

What do I want to see? What are its limitations. How can you fix that? How can you flip it or change your solution. What can be created then? How can you get it created> Get on board with research? How do designers get on board with researchers?

I find brands closest to me. I become like them. let them define me. They should become like me. Custom has no brand because it is too expensive. Of course getting custom says something as well. Works for t-shirts thought.

The way we view cashiers as going on with their life in a way and not thinking about the point or wondering how to get or create meaning, Sillicon valley seems like the same thing. People making things because that is what they are supposed to do. What they can do, as an engineer. Not because they believe in some need anymore than a cashier does. Its shallow too often, which is fine until it is glorified as being anything else. To create wealth is not wrong. The attitude can be painful to be surrounded by. Just as I would not enjoy being a stockbroker because of the people and the stigma, I do not like this start up world. But I do enjoy creating. I do want to build, I do want to make that difference. Build something dope first, monetize later if you care about it. Or build a business because you need to make money.

People that can build something from nothing create wealth. Or build something into something something better, perhaps by combining things or using a specialized or timely method. But this is what many people do. Some create more less and more often at higher premiums. The more you can create from less, the less likely someone else is that qualified to do it also, or well. In this way inventing is hard, but if you succeed, few others may, although their odds are the same but their ingredients are different.

Only you have the exact ingredients you have, allowing you to come up with the exact version you do. But you want the ingredients that are the best to make th best version. And whiskey and milk don't go together. You need the best product created by a good recipe. You need to have the best recipe.

Much like environments and people your books make you. You are a sponge gradually drying up. You are filled with whatever solution was in you last. Different solutions make you less saturated with one, but more saturated overall. Some are better for cleaning. You need to get remoistened frequently to be effective. You must choose the right stimuli, and often.
Reason you don't have 1000 Leonardo DeVinci's if you have 1000 more people. There was something going on during his time that  (loved) artists.
Recipe for great work is very exacting taste and the ability to gratify it.
Recognize and know what is great, and then make it. (one must be able to) A critic and a composer.
Things I would be a good critic at: How I can improve my diligence: How i can make it so people make better versions of it.
I want to show affection to people I care about. I don't need their praise. Just their respect. I don't really care about most people. It would help to, but so whatâ¦
With restaurants I'm partially paying for the knowledge that I did not make it.
Surround yourself by people like who you want to be, because buildings and people and voices and equals are the things on which your thoughts feed.
Because thoughts turn to actions and expression your face.
Want to be doing something where you are irreplaceable. Otherwise whats the point? Someone else could do it. You believe that you ideas and talents are special and you have something unique to offer.

A parent works hard to look a certain way and be a certain person. A child adopts all their ways from the parent, including mannerisms. Goes through more of the struggle to figure out how to look that way. So he can look the part and perhaps learn to improve, in which case he will grasp it. If not, he will look the part with a shallow understanding of why its effective and perhaps how to use it. Or why its best. Rather than formulating an opinion on what is best, he will just accept what he is as something that works, which does not translate to other fields.
I already am the present hat makes things. Realizing it makes the difference.

Its not that I"m as smart, its that I am them if I create, even if I don't. They think the same things as me. People can teach me. And I can teach them. Its sharing experience,. Not as an older to a younger but as the same, helping that person out. Be grateful for their advice. Learn a lesson from them. Know they are different.
People are different.
I don't need to be solemn. Just need to realize things are not a miracle, they were created by me. Other versions of me, who I already am.
And the buildings and the book that you see, were created by people, the same as me.

You love yourself. It doesn't mean you think you are better than other people, just that you wouldn't want to be someone else. That you know what you want to do and you like the way you think. Even if you think you could use improvement, in your own eyes.

Need a way to get back into flow. A shortcut of something to read.To get back on track with my thoughts. Its as if I need to hear and believe the arguments agin. To be reminded and convinced of a certain truth. And how things connect to each other.
Similar to Dalai Lama reaching Gamma after 4 hours. I need to think about these ideas to get back to a certain state where I feel I have the depth in my mind to say things that seem less brainless.
200,000 people x 2000 hrs/year x 100 years. 40 billion hours have gone into figuring out an automobile.

We feel defeated by our environment. We feel helpless compared to the existence and and complexity of the things around us. We don't realize how much time, training, theft and complying has led to things being the way they are.
Perhaps until you create it yourself, you have a feeling of helplessness and that you wouldn't know how to do that rather than trying to break it down into elements.

Even if you have made it, the techniques you don't know and the beauty you did not think of, that inspire you also make you feel like a failure. Half-rate. That person may look at their work and feel mediocre. But you know when something is great, and when it isn't.
Stores of big shots saying they didn't know they were onto something, Showing they are human. We strive for heroes, but we don't hear the unconfident dialogue, their longing, their uncertainty.
Perhaps the great ones are the ones who did not ask about uncertainties but build what they knew was great.
You already are these people. The only thing that is between you and them is action.

I did not create nature. But I could destroy it, chop it, manipulate it, let it grow, guide it, control it, harness it, turn it into all of the things that I build. Its the reason I can make anything I can make, because I can take and change nature.

We are the same as a computer in that we don't have will. A geyser heats up and blows. It does not think. It responds to stimuli to pressure. A computer responds to on and off switches and shows certain pixels but through many layers of complexities and languages. it responds to use touching it. We are the same. Information reaches us through our sensors, our keyboard, mice, the rocks touching the heat, and our nervous system reacts and our brain learns and decides how it should react. Through machine learning, it knows what pixels to show and expressions to make and things to say. it is like a sea urchant that reacts when predators are near by even though it does not think. it is like dropping water on a straw wrapper and making it move. it is all a mechanical process at some level. Skin heats up, which changes pressure in a nerve, which is built to react a certain way, and by built I mean that the way the physics is set up is like an inanimate object reacting. When the pressure on the rock becomes too high, steam shoots upward. Our nervous system doing this is just as arbitrary, but for the billion times the nervous system was not build like this (like all of the rocks not shaped like spheres for us to use a s a wheel)l this system was without purpose even if we found purpose in it and it became useful. It did not set out to do this. This rock did not set out to be round but events made it that way and it became incredibly useful.

Its no wonder our DNA is not so different from other animals, we're made of the same things, we're just wired differently. A bicycle and a car are both made of rubber, metal and plastic, but they are arranged differently. But they are two different arrangements that survived but that stem from the wheel. There are plenty that did not work well and are not around, and there are now ones coming out, like the Segway. But intelligence is not all. Survivability is. More poor people are having kids then rich smart people.

When you look at people this way, you see them as a series of calculations. You must remember that there are many unknown factors to their calculations. You try to figure out the unknowns from their face and movement. Gather cues about how they calculate.

Society puts rope up to prevent both given you receive from them in return. None are obligated to accept or follow any other, but they must face the consequences of their action, whatever it be. For this reason, it is sometimes better not to act as not to face such consequences, and ideally have more happiness overall.
